planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION: Labor and working conditions
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES: Vulnerable workers. Provide appropriate measures of protection and assistance to address the vulnerabilities of project workers, including specific groups of workers, such as women, people with disabi

planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION: Air pollution
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES:
There should be no burning of waste or construction materials or cleared vegetation on site.
Cement processing plants should be far from residential areas.

planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION:
Security Risk
Cultural barrier
Covid 19 
Risk of decree from the Government
Economical risk
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES:
Provide support with UN transportation like UN flights from regions to Kabul. Ensure all participants are fully vaccinated for covid 19 to strengthen the capacity building.

planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION: Lack of overall support, engagement and participation, including Snr LDP and Mnmgt, from other AFPs.
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES: Hold AFPs Snr LDP and Mnamt. accountable.

planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION: Potentially leading to unhealthy relationships or monopolistic behaviour, perception of preferences, or collusion among suppliers resulting in uncompetitive prices, thus diminishing quality and creati
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES: Closely and timely monitoring of the LTAs, the performance of the Suppliers under LTA and do market research for changes in price in the market as well as on the new items in the market.

planRisks.RISK_DESCRIPTION: Lengthy process and low contribution from the particular agencies.
planRisks.MITIGATION_MEASURES: Close follow-up with the OMT member.
